column4: hi! where can I download or find package name 'obexserver'? there is no package on that in repository. please advise.
I did that but no results
i have results, you might haven't enabled universe repositories, from the menu: system > administration > software sources> check everything under "downloadable from the internet"
my option "community-maintained open source software (universe)" is already enabled...
I tried "obex" and got results, maybe it's not an obexserver package, or maybe it's not included :)
if it's the latter case, then you'll have to google your way to find it
that is what im doing now :)
i think google still doesnt gimme links :(
why do you need obexserver? which program requires that package?
for bluetooth. i want to transfer my files in nokia phone going to pc.. and this link hits me attention to follow-in.. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=34740
go to menu: applications > add/remove > type "bluetooth", wait for some seconds and check the obex program there to download it
it's the 5th one in my list
